txt.en: 'I am here to help you learn how to use skills that will make you a more powerful Guardian. As you gain levels, more skills will become available to you.\n\nHINT: Guardians rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Reactive Skills</rgb> to deal damage and generate <rgb=#ff0000>Threat</rgb> against their enemies. <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> requires that the Guardian <rgb=#ffff00>Block</rgb> an incoming enemy attack before they can use the skill. Head over to the <rgb=#ff0000>Training-dummies</rgb> to the north of the trainer and attack it until you successfully block one of their attacks. If you're having trouble getting a block, try using <rgb=#00ff00>Guardian's Ward</rgb> to increase your chances of blocking enemy attacks. Once you have blocked an attack you will be able to use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> skill.  Strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training-dummy</rgb> with <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb>.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Guardian someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'

'Strike the Training-dummy with your <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'\n\nHINT: Guardians rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Reactive Skills</rgb> to deal damage and generate <rgb=#ff0000>Threat</rgb> against their enemies. <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> requires that the Guardian <rgb=#ffff00>Block</rgb> an incoming enemy attack before they can use the skill. Head over to the <rgb=#ff0000>Training-Dummies</rgb> to the north of the trainer and attack it until you successfully block one of their attacks. If you're having trouble getting a block, try using <rgb=#00ff00>Guardian's Ward</rgb> to increase your chances of blocking enemy attacks. Once you have blocked an attack you will be able to use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> skill.  Strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Targeting Dummy</rgb> with <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb>.
As you gain levels, you will learn new skills to help you develop into a more powerful Guardian.
You have struck the Training-dummy with 'Shield Swipe'

Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> skill on the Training-dummy nearby. 

HINT:

Guardians rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Reactive Skills</rgb> to deal damage and generate <rgb=#ff0000>Threat</rgb> against their enemies.  <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> requires that the Guardian <rgb=#ffff00>Block</rgb> an incoming enemy attack before they can use the skill. Head over to the <rgb=#ff0000>Training-dummies</rgb> to the north of the trainer and attack it until you successfully block one of their attacks. If you're having trouble getting a block, try using <rgb=#00ff00>Guardian's Ward</rgb> to increase your chances of blocking enemy attacks. Once you have blocked an attack you will be able to use your <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb> skill.  Strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training-dummy</rgb> with <rgb=#00ff00>Shield Swipe</rgb>.
Talk to the Guardian Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
The Guardian Trainer is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, you should return to your trainer and tell her of your success.
